verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
On a journey from Jerusalem,
returning to their home

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Joseph traveled all day long

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: They must have walked for many miles before they realized,

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: Jesus was not with them

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: Mary sadly cried

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Where is Jesus?

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: Did we leave him far behind?

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: Did we take for granted He was here

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: Walking with us all the time?

verse.name: c1f
verse.lines: To find Him once again,

verse.name: c1g
verse.lines: We must return to the place where we left Him.

verse.name: c1h
verse.lines: Where is Jesus.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: I prayed to God to lead my way,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: That His will for me be known

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: All He asks is that I wait for Him still I stepped out on my own

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: Without Him here to guide my steps,

verse.name: v2e
verse.lines: I failed Him many times.

verse.name: v2f
verse.lines: I only have my self to blame,

verse.name: v2g
verse.lines: I bowed my head and cried

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: You've made some bad decisions with a selfish thought in mind

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: You had the best intentions for the goals you set in life

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines: Your relationship with God's secure but the fellowship is gone.

verse.name: v3d
verse.lines: You can choose to walk with Him again you don't have to walk alone.
